definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Many neighborhood associations or condominium associations have taxing authority, and can compel individuals to contribute.
sentences.chinese: 许多社区都有收税权，能够强迫个人捐款。

sentences.english: Some tax collectors feather their own nests while they have opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 有些收税员有机会即营私中饱。

sentences.english: ROBINSON Alright collect taxes through the Treasury. Veteran's Affairs?
sentences.chinese: 通过财政部收税，好。退伍军人事务部？

sentences.english: Truffle "hunters" try to avoid the taxman as much as drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 松露“猎手”躲避收税员就像毒贩一样。

sentences.english: They just take place beyond the taxman 's reach.
sentences.chinese: 只是不关收税员什么事而已。

sentences.english: It is more like a tax collector.
sentences.chinese: 公司更像是一个收税员。

sentences.english: Her tone was flat as a tax collector's.
sentences.chinese: 她的语调象收税员一样的平直。

sentences.english: You've undoubtedly heard the line about death and the taxman.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，你听说过关于死亡和收税员行。

sentences.english: Chongqing to divide houses into 10 categories and levy property tax rates based on the divisions.
sentences.chinese: 重庆将住房分成10个等级并根据等级进行收税。

sentences.english: States collect taxes and subsume many of the responsibilities of governing from the county.
sentences.chinese: 邦国负责收税也包纳交集很多郡县一级的治理职责。

sentences.english: She reached a turnpike-gate which stood upon the highway to the village.
sentences.chinese: 她走到了通向村子的那条大道的收税栅门。

sentences.english: We do heavily tax the exploiting classes.
sentences.chinese: 我们对剥削阶级是狠狠地收税的。

sentences.english: But then you'd hire out other people to do the taxes.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们会雇人替他们收税。

sentences.english: But they didn't-- the Romans themselves didn't want to be bothered with collecting taxes.
sentences.chinese: 但罗马人自己懒得负责收税。

sentences.english: Meanwhile Obama wants to charge cows for farting in the USA.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，在美国，奥巴马想要对牛放屁收税呢。

sentences.english: This was the way they collected their taxes.
sentences.chinese: 他们自己就是这么收税的。

definition: taxation/in former times, esp. land tax
not liable to taxation (of monastery, imperial family etc)/tax free/duty free (shop)
to apportion expenses, responsibilities etc/to demand contributions
